Learn more on Life at Now blog and hear from our employees about their experiences working at ServiceNow.Job DescriptionThis position reports to: Sr. Manager, Systems Engineering - Tools  The Systems Engineering Tools team at ServiceNow is looking for an experienced Tools and automation Engineer to further enhance our large-scale infrastructure service delivery and message backbone tooling.  We’re looking for a skilled systems engineer and developer who can help craft the technology and processes needed to sustain ServiceNow’s rapid growth and pace of innovation. What you get to do in this role Develop and maintain software-defined infrastructure and tools, at scaleIntroduce new ideas to simplify, standardize and automate our environmentsWrite test plans and test automation for declarative infrastructure in multiple cloud environmentsBuild orchestration workflows by leveraging features of the ServiceNow platformInfluence a team to write, review, and deploy everything as codeQualificationsTo be successful in this role you have:Passionate for and skilled at software development, problem-solving, testing and troubleshootingProficient designing, authoring, testing, and debugging code in a popular systems language such as Python, Java, Javascript, Go or RubyExperienced with setting up CI/CD pipelinesExperienced managing infrastructure as code utilizing tools such as CloudFormation or TerraformExperienced with configuration management tools such as Puppet or AnsibleFamiliar with Unix shell and source control systems and tools such as gitHas a working understanding of related infrastructure concepts such as IP networking, block and file storage, load-balancers, etcHas a working understanding of related internet protocols such as DNS, LDAP, NTP, SMTP, HTTP, etcIs an excellent oral and written communicatorAdditional InformationServiceNow is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer.
